teams.name: The Meadows School MicroBank
teams.loan_because: As Margaret Mead said, we "never doubt that a small group of committed and dedicated people can change the world. In fact, it is the only thing that ever has."
teams.description: We are a student group from The Meadows School that is doing what we can to make the world a little better place.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Geocachers help Kiva
teams.loan_because:
Gleiche Chancen für alle!
Ist bei uns in einem sozialen Staat selbstverständlich.  Aber leider nicht auf der ganzen Welt.
Das Ziel soll sein das man den Menschen die Möglichkeit gibt mit einem Kleinkredit eine neue Existenz aufzubauen.
Doch die Organisation KIVA und ihnen kann man die Möglichkeit geben den Menschen auf eine einfache Art zu helfen. Ab einem Darlehen von $ 25 kann man so viele Menschen helfen die sonst keinen Kredit erhalten würden. Umso mehr Leute mitmachen desto mehr kann man in der ganzen Welt helfen.
Ich würde mich freuen wenn auch Ihr euch in meiner Gruppe bei KIVA anschliesst.
http://www.kiva.org/team/Chancen
teams.description:
Equal opportunities for all!
Of course, is with us in a social state. But unfortunately not all over the world.
The goal should be the one giving people the opportunity with a small loan to build a new life.
But the organization KIVA and they can give people the opportunity to a simple way to help. From a loan of $ 25 can help so many people that otherwise would receive no credit. The more people can join the more you help around the world.
I would be glad if your connects you in my group at KIVA.
http://www.kiva.org/team/Chancen

teams.name: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls
teams.loan_because: You change the world one kindness at a time.
teams.description: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls knows there is still inequality all over the world. The basis of that inequality is that you are being denied the ability to be yourself. We must all be be able to make choices that can lead to a better life. Micro-loans make choices available.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.whereabouts: Harvard-Westlake School, 3700 Coldwater Canyon Ave  Studio City, CA 91604
teams.loan_because: we want to help those in need. This project is in honor of our Aunt Kim who is battling breast cancer. Please view and share our Youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lm6zI4wANSg

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.

teams.name: Friends of Matthias Heinrichs
teams.loan_because:
From our Christian background we believe it is our duty and responsibility to do unto others as we would have them do unto us. Many people in the world are not as fortunate and blessed with the luxuries that we are so we believe it is our blessing to be able to help others in need. 

We strongly believe that to truly help someone is to teach them or help them to help themselves. We believe that helping people starting their own businesses and providing themselves with a profitable business scenario that will help them become selfsustaining is a worthy cause. 

We would invite all of you that have a similar mindset to join in and see how we can continue to provide gifts that keep on giving!
teams.description: It's a team that shares the same principles and ideas and that strive to make the world a better place bit by bit!

So in 2014, we are "Redeeming the Resume Black Hole" by asking all 100,000+ people who apply to jobs through the Ian Martin Group, to use our funds to make a loan on Kiva!

For more:
http://ianmartin.com/blog/2014/01/redeeming-the-resume-black-hole/

Check out our progress here: http://www.kiva.org/team/ianmartin/goals
teams.description:
Founded in 1957, the Ian Martin Group is North America's most progressive recruitment and project-staffing firm.  As a Certified B Corporation, we meet comprehensive standards that measure our impact on employees, suppliers, community, and the environment. Our guiding statement is: “building authentic connections around meaningful work.”
 
The Ian Martin family includes technical recruitment divisions IME, IMT and IMIT – experts in Engineering, Telecom and IT respectively. The 500 Staffing is best understood as 'not so’ General Staffing and Ian Martin Executive which focuses on providing exceptional business leadership to technical and scientific centered organizations. 

http://ianmartin.com
http://ianmartin.com/blog
https://twitter.com/IanMartinGroup
https://facebook.com/IanMartinGroup
http://bcorporation.net/ianmartingroup

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Fundriding
teams.loan_because: It makes us feel good and boosts our training! Read why and how here http://2blua.com/fundriding
teams.description: 1 km = 25 cent! Members of this team commit to deposit to their Kiva account as many 25 cents a month as they put kilometers behind them, be that using bike, shoes, roller skates, ice skates, kajak and what have you. As an extra bonus, aside from the good feeling of doing something useful, all members are awarded with better health! Join us, you too! Check out http://2blua.com/fundriding for more information!

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Friends of Interactuar Colombia
teams.loan_because: We love Medellin!
teams.description: Interactuar is Kiva's only partner working in and around the city of Medellin, Colombia. Following the violence and political unrest of the 1980s, Medellin is still struggling to find a cultural identity and overcome issues of poverty and a lack of access to basic services. Interactuar offers microcredit, microinsurance and services for clients that include business consulting, education, a nutrition lab, a marketing department and a business start up center!

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Bo - a celebration
teams.loan_because: Kiva allows those with little income or erratic income to give to those more disadvantage than themselves – and to give generously - by repeatedly re-distributing the original donation each month.
teams.description:
Those who ever met my much much adored 22-year-old Bo, could not fail to perceive a very considerate, kind generous soul. Despite his youth he had already been impressively proactive in helping disadvantaged people. Let’s continue in his vein.

Bo would have liked the idea of a Kiva team in his name, and he would have been touched.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: McGraw Hill Financial
teams.loan_because:
Corporate Responsibility is fundamental to MHFI. It guides who we are, how we conduct ourselves and how we interact with those around us.

Corporate Responsibility Essentials at MHFI encompass:

– Financial Essentials – we help to provide the fundamental financial knowledge that can build better lives, stronger communities and stable economies and financial markets. 

– Community Essentials – we help deploy and foster the resources and skills that lead to smarter, stronger, more inclusive communities. Our employees are integral partners in our dedication to this critical purpose. 

– Environmental Essentials – we offer innovative business services that promote sustainability while applying best practice to reduce the environmental footprint of our operations.
teams.description:
McGraw Hill Financial is a high-growth, high-margin benchmarks, content and analytics company serving the capital and commodity markets. MHFI believes a responsible business is one that delivers value for investors, customers, employees and communities; makes wise use of natural resources; and treats people fairly.

We are home to some of the most iconic brands in finance and business, including: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services, S&P Capital IQ, S&P Dow Jones Indices, Platts, J.D. Power, and McGraw Hill Construction. Our independent credit ratings, indices, analytics, price assessments and research provide clients with the essential intelligence to manage risk and identify opportunities to grow.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Trulia Employees and Friends
teams.loan_because:
We are here to help, wherever that may be.

At Trulia, we want to "show them home" and housing loans are one way to help.

As Paul Cuvila in Mozambique so eloquently states for Kiva Fellows that:

"A home is very important because it benefits the whole family. It's a social good that is fundamental to development of the country. In one way or another it helps reduce absolute poverty. Poverty can be understood in many ways but it's much more extreme when you do not have a roof over your head."
teams.description: We are individuals that are Trulia employees and friends all independently contributing to Kiva with wide interests including housing loans.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:

HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Aunt Kim's Birthday Gift by Vietnam Initiative Project of Harvard-Westlake School
teams.whereabouts: Harvard-Westlake School, 3700 Coldwater Canyon Ave  Studio City, CA 91604
teams.loan_because: we want to help those in need. This project is in honor of our Aunt Kim who is battling breast cancer. She is a giving and selfless person, and we are making loans to budding entrepreneurs in extension of that spirit of generosity and charity. Please view and share our Youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lm6zI4wANSg
teams.description: Vietnam Initiative Project is a student organization started at Harvard Westlake High School with many members in high schools in Southern California. The student organization is coordinating the fundraising efforts for this project on behalf of the Aunt of one of its members.

teams.name: Friends of COLFUTURO
teams.loan_because: We believe that all Colombians regardless of socio-economic status have the right to pursue higher education.
teams.description:
Colfuturo is a non-profit public service institution founded in 1991 to help high-achieving Colombian students pursue post-graduate degrees abroad.

With the Semillero Regional scholarship program, we target students from more remote, lower-income regions and marginalized social groups. The three-year program is designed to help students who would not otherwise have the opportunity to pursue post-graduate degrees.

teams.name: The Meadows School MicroBank
teams.loan_because: As Margaret Mead said, we "never doubt that a small group of committed and dedicated people can change the world. In fact, it is the only thing that ever has."

teams.name: Para México
teams.loan_because:
We work hard and have been fortunate enough to give a little back to our country México.
----------
Trabajamos duro  y hemos sido los suficientemente afortunados para poder ayudar un poquito a nuestro pais México.
teams.description:
This team is open for: 1) Anyone interested in supporting entrepreneurs in Mexico.  2) Any Mexican interested in supporting entrepreneurs around the world.  3) This group is just open to everyone!
----------
Este equipo esta abierto para: 1) Cualquier persona interesada en apoyar microempresarios en México. 2) Cualquier mexicano interesado en apoyar microempresarios en todo el mundo.  3) En realidad este grupo esta abierto para todos!

teams.name: Ian Martin Group
teams.loan_because:
We see a world with each and every person pursuing meaningful work.

So in 2014, we are "Redeeming the Resume Black Hole" by asking all 100,000+ people who apply to jobs through the Ian Martin Group, to use our funds to make a loan on Kiva!

For more:
http://ianmartin.com/blog/2014/01/redeeming-the-resume-black-hole/

Check out our progress here: http://www.kiva.org/team/ianmartin/goals
teams.description:
Founded in 1957, the Ian Martin Group is North America's most progressive recruitment and project-staffing firm.  As a Certified B Corporation, we meet comprehensive standards that measure our impact on employees, suppliers, community, and the environment. Our guiding statement is: “building authentic connections around meaningful work.”
 
The Ian Martin family includes technical recruitment divisions IME, IMT and IMIT – experts in Engineering, Telecom and IT respectively. The 500 Staffing is best understood as 'not so’ General Staffing and Ian Martin Executive which focuses on providing exceptional business leadership to technical and scientific centered organizations. 

http://ianmartin.com
http://ianmartin.com/blog
https://twitter.com/IanMartinGroup
https://facebook.com/IanMartinGroup
http://bcorporation.net/ianmartingroup

HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Aunt Kim's Birthday Gift by Vietnam Initiative Project of Harvard-Westlake School
teams.whereabouts: Harvard-Westlake School, 3700 Coldwater Canyon Ave  Studio City, CA 91604
teams.loan_because: we want to help those in need. This project is in honor of our Aunt Kim who is battling breast cancer. She is a giving and selfless person, and we are making loans to budding entrepreneurs in extension of that spirit of generosity and charity. Please view and share our Youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lm6zI4wANSg
teams.description: Vietnam Initiative Project is a student organization started at Harvard Westlake High School with many members in high schools in Southern California. The student organization is coordinating the fundraising efforts for this project on behalf of the Aunt of one of its members.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds
